title: Freshdesk + Dynamics 365
subtitle: Product Design
greetingText: Freshdesk + Dynamics is an integration that let you sync all Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM contacts and accounts with Freshdesk to provide exceptional sales and customer support.
detailsText: Our big challenge was to make a CRM app intuitive for users that are not used to manage this kind of information. We did several research and talked with a Dynamics advisor to have a deeper knowledge of the app to translate it into an easily language.
contributionList: Mockup design: provide the Invision prototype and Sketch files
